description: This file is a PHP source file for configuring local IP settings on a gateway device. It includes server-side PHP logic for retrieving network configuration parameters, as well as embedded HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for rendering and managing a web-based user interface for network configuration, including IPv4 and IPv6 settings, DHCP options, DNS servers, and related network parameters.

methods.name: setIPv6configuration
methods.description: Sends an AJAX POST request to apply IPv6 network configuration settings and reloads the page upon success.

methods.name: setIPconfiguration
methods.description: Sends an AJAX POST request to apply IPv4 network configuration settings and manages device reboot if relevant.

methods.name: checkForRebooting
methods.description: Periodically checks whether the device has rebooted by attempting to access the index.php page and then redirects to it.
